casebody.data:
E. L. MANSURE COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. CONSOLIDATED TRIMMING CORPORATION et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 391. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 7, 1937. John M. Cole, of New York City (Joshua R. H. Potts, Basel H. Bruñe, and Eugene Vincent Clarke, all of Chicago, 111., of counsel), for appellant. Fred E. Tasker, of New York City (Marshall & Hawley, of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decision affirmed.
